title: MEASURE Desktop Pen Holder (Special Grommets)
description: The Desktop Pen Holder is a versatile grommet designed for organizing pens, pencils, and cables on workstations. It integrates seamlessly with desks, helping maintain a clutter-free and efficient workspace.

title: MEASURE Frameless Series (Clamshell Box)
description: Frameless Series Clamshell Box for Work: A solution for cable management with a flip-open cover. Designed for clean and efficient workspace organization, allowing easy cable access while maintaining a sleek appearance.

title: MEASURE Snake Conduit (Wire Tube)
description: The Snake Conduit is an efficient cable management solution designed to keep your workspace neat. Made from high-quality ABS plastic, it is robust and flexible, ensuring ease of use and a clutter-free environment.

title: MEASURE Modesty Brackets (With Accessories)
description: Enhance the functionality and aesthetics of your office setup with our premium modesty brackets, designed for secure installation and a polished finish. Upgrade your office with modesty brackets that combine strength, style, and seamless installation, ensuring a professional and clutter-free workspace!

title: MEASURE Screens (Acoustic & Acrylic Panels)
description: These panels are designed to provide enhanced privacy and noise reduction in workspaces, ensuring a more productive and comfortable environment. They are lightweight, durable, and available in various materials and sizes to suit different office setups.

title: MEASURE Cable Tray (Bottom Box)
description: The Cable Tray is designed for efficient cable organization under desks. Its steel construction ensures durability, while its nail-free assembly allows for quick and secure installation

title: MEASURE Conference Line Series (Cable Box)
description: The Line Series Cable Box for Office is designed to provide an efficient and elegant cable management solution for modern office spaces, ensuring a neat and organized environment.

title: MEASURE Workstation Line Series (Cable Box)
description: Line Series Cable Box for Work: A solution for cable management at work. Designed to eliminate tangled cables and improve workspace organization.

title: MEASURE CPU Holder (and Keyboard Tray)
description: Optimize your workspace with the MEASURE CPU Holder & Keyboard Tray, designed for better organization, ergonomic comfort, and space efficiency.

title: MEASURE Partition Clamps
description: Enhance your workspace organization and privacy with Partition Clamps, a reliable and aesthetically pleasing solution for mounting partition panels to desks and workstations.

title: MEASURE Monitor Arm - Table Mount SeriesDual
description: MOZOELECTRIC Monitor Arm - Table Mount Series DUAL loading capacity: 2-9kg Screen Size: 17-27'' Tilt Range: - 85°-15° Clamp&Grommet Rotate, swivel, extend or tilt your screens with just a touch of your fingertip so that your screens are always exactly where you want them.

title: MEASURE X GAMING DESK
description: Our gaming desks allow you to fill your perspective and create a fully immersive experience. With the cool appearance, it's the perfect desk for anyone who loves to spend an hour's gaming.

title: MEASURE Solo Electric desk (Adjustable desk with Single-Motor)
description: MOZOELECTRIC Adjustable desk. (Single-Motor) Combining advanced functions with a reasonable price, the series is not only budget-friendly but proven for its quality standard and its effectiveness.

title: MEASURE (Monitor Arm - Table Mount Series Single)
description: MEASURE TOZO-S (Monitor Arm - Table Mount Series Single) MEASURE MOZOELECTRIC Monitor Arm, Table Mount Series Single

title: MEASURE DUO Electric Desk (Electric Height-Adjustable Desk)
MEASURE L SHAPE ADJUSTABLE FIXED GAMING DESK
description: MOZOELECTRIC Adjustable Fixed Gaming Desk With RGB Lighting

title: KEYLESS CABINET/ DRAWER LOCK
description: KEYLESS CABINET/ DRAWER LOCK is a hassle-free, keyless locking solution designed for modern wardrobes and cabinets.

title: STURDY LOCK FOR CABINET
description: The STURDY LOCK FOR CABINET is a premium cabinet lock crafted from durable zinc alloy, ensuring long-lasting performance and security.

title: Desk Grommet USB Charger with Power Ports
description: The Desk Grommet USB Charger is a versatile and space-saving power solution for modern workstations.
